DOC.brief_summary: A prospective randomized study compare new implant three interlocked pin internal fixation femoral neck fracture ( Hansson Pinloc System , Swemac Linköping , Sweden ) versus 2 parallel pin hook ( Hansson Pins , Swemac Linköping , Sweden ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pinloc Versus Hansson Pins Treatment Femoral Neck Fractures .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients , treat internal fixation due femoral neck fracture , randomize surgeon Pinloc Hansson Pins use on-line randomization system . The patient follow open visit 3 month 1 year . At two year patient contact phone medical record study order detect fracture complication .
DOC.criteria: Femoral neck fracture prefer treatment internal fixation . Unwilling participate .
